// ==UserScript==
// Add Time to Subject Display
// @versionÂ  Â Â  Â 0.1
// @descriptionÂ Â try to take over the world!

// ==/UserScript==

(function() {
Â  Â  'use strict';
Â  Â  function GetUserCollectionTime(user_id, subject_id) {
Â  Â Â  Â Â Â let uri = 'https://api.bgm.tv/v0/users/'+user_id+'/collections/'+subject_id
Â  Â Â  Â Â Â $.ajax({
Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â  type: "GET",
Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â  url: uri,
Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â  success: function (data) {
Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â Â let html = document.createElement('span');
Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â Â html.innerText = data.updated_at.split('T')[0]
Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â Â html.style = "color:gray"
Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â Â let target = $('div.SidePanel hr.board')[0]
Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â Â target.parentNode.insertBefore(html, target);
Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â Â console.log(html)
Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â Â chiiLib.tml.prepareAjax();
Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â  },
Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â  error: function (html) {
Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â Â $("#robot_speech_js").html(AJAXtip['error']);
Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â Â $("#robot").animate({
Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â opacity: 1
Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â Â }, 1000).fadeOut(500);
Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â  }
Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â });

Â  Â  }

Â  Â  let url = window.location.href
Â  Â  let subject_id = url.split('/subject/')[1]
Â  Â  let user_id = $('a.avatar')[0].href.split('/user/')[1]
Â  Â  GetUserCollectionTime(user_id, subject_id)
})();
